name: Coloring Wars
description:
It's finally here so jump into battle with this new PvP game! Designed to be strategic, Coloring Wars is a first of its' kind. What's the objective? Well color the the most tiles of coarse! Spend the best 2 out of 3 rounds coloring the most tiles and attacking enemy units! The player with the most rounds win!

Coloring Wars' features a variety of social aspects!
- Guild Battles! Everyday at 8:30 P.M. EST, players in a clan have the option to join a clan battle to complete for top 100. At the end of the week, the top 100 guilds of each ranking ("C", "B", "A", "S") will receive a reward! So battle on!
- Add friends to play private games, trade cards and even message!
- Create a group chat and invite up to 10 of your friends!
- Upload your favorite pictures to the chats!

Customizations
- You can customize your complete gamer card the way you want to!
- Choose a favorite tile color or customize your own color when playing games
- Customize your chat bubble color for messages and game chat!
- Choose a favorite profile picture border to show off to the world!
- Set your playable deck your way by unlocking new units!
- Change your motto to let other's know what your thinking!

Game Features
- In-Game chat
- A ranking system ("C", "B", "A", "S") to show off your skill!
- Gem multiplier (With multiple games in a row to increase your multiplier)
- Spectate friends
- Request private matches
- View leaderboards to view top 100 players for daily, weekly, monthly and all time
- Customizable tile color and attack explosion color

Store
- Two currency's to use, gems and rubies!
- Use gems to unlock new cards
- Rubies are earned by dismantling extra cards
- Use rubies to customize your motto, border for profile picture, tile color, and even chat bubbles

Variety of units
- With 10 different types, there are over 100+ units to choose from!
- Each type ("Tyrant", "Tactician", "Sage", "Mercenary", "Hunter", "Barricade", "Rogue", "Magician", "Guardian", and "Artillery") has its own unique tile pattern!
- There are 4 different rarities of units ("Common", "Rare", "Limited", and "One of a Kind") that a player can collect

Other features
- Redeem special codes on special events
- Dismantle extra cards you may no longer need
- Chat filters to prevent the use of mean, hurtful and inappropriate messages
- Own the chat? Change the chat members, name!
- Pin the chat to the top of the list of chats!
- Turn on do not disturb for the chat to prevent being annoyed!
- Achievements, Daily, and weekly challenges to complete! Complete a challenge to earn gems or rubies
- Daily Spin for extra gems or rubies!
- This game supports up to 20 different languages!
